frontmatter.title: MODULE 0 — Welcome & Course Orientation
frontmatter.description: Get started with the STR Foundations Master Program. Learn about the course structure, what to expect, and how to make the most of your learning journey.

frontmatter.title: MODULE 1 — Short-Term Rental (STR) Fundamentals & The Host Mindset
frontmatter.description: Master the foundational concepts of short-term rentals and develop the mindset needed for hosting success.

frontmatter.title: MODULE 2 — MARKET RESEARCH & STR ANALYSIS MASTERCLASS
frontmatter.description: Learn how to analyze markets, identify profitable opportunities, and make data-driven decisions for your STR business.

frontmatter.title: MODULE 3 — High-Converting Listings: Photos, Copywriting & Trust Signals
frontmatter.description: Create compelling listings that convert browsers into bookers with professional photos, persuasive copy, and trust-building elements.

frontmatter.title: MODULE 4 — Smart Pricing & Revenue Management for STR Hosts
frontmatter.description: Master dynamic pricing strategies and revenue optimization techniques to maximize your STR income.

frontmatter.title: MODULE 5 — Mastering Booking Management, Calendars, & Guest Screening
frontmatter.description: Learn effective booking management, calendar optimization, and guest screening techniques to protect your property and maximize occupancy.

frontmatter.title: MODULE 6 — Designing a 5-Star Guest Experience System
frontmatter.description: Create a systematic approach to delivering exceptional guest experiences that generate 5-star reviews and repeat bookings.

frontmatter.title: MODULE 7 — Cleaning Systems & Turnover Excellence
frontmatter.description: Develop efficient cleaning systems and turnover processes to maintain high standards while minimizing costs and time.

frontmatter.title: MODULE 8 — Enhancing Guest Experience Through Design, Amenities & Hospitality Excellence
frontmatter.description: Elevate your property with strategic design choices, thoughtful amenities, and hospitality best practices.

frontmatter.title: MODULE 9 — Smart Home Automation & Technology for STR Efficiency
frontmatter.description: Leverage smart home technology and automation tools to streamline operations and enhance the guest experience.

frontmatter.title: MODULE 10 — PROFIT MAXIMIZATION STRATEGIES FOR SHORT-TERM RENTAL HOSTS
frontmatter.description: Discover advanced strategies to maximize profitability, reduce costs, and optimize your STR business performance.

frontmatter.title: MODULE 11 — MASTERING AUTOMATION & SYSTEMS FOR HANDS-OFF HOSTING
frontmatter.description: Build automated systems and processes that allow you to run your STR business with minimal daily involvement.

frontmatter.title: MODULE 12 — MASTERING AIRBNB SEO & ALGORITHM OPTIMIZATION
frontmatter.description: Learn how to optimize your listings for Airbnb's search algorithm to increase visibility and bookings.

frontmatter.title: MODULE 13 — MULTI-PLATFORM HOSTING MASTERY
frontmatter.description: Expand your reach by mastering multiple booking platforms beyond Airbnb, including Vrbo, Booking.com, and more.

frontmatter.title: MODULE 14 — CLEANING WORKFLOWS & TURNOVER EXCELLENCE FOR AIRBNB / STR HOSTS
frontmatter.description: Advanced cleaning workflows and turnover systems to maintain consistency and quality across all your properties.

frontmatter.title: MODULE 15 — DIRECT BOOKINGS MASTERCLASS: BRANDING, WEBSITE, MARKETING & CONVERSION SYSTEMS
frontmatter.description: Build your own direct booking channel to reduce platform fees and increase profit margins through effective branding and marketing.

frontmatter.title: MODULE 16 — SCALING TO MULTIPLE LISTINGS: SYSTEMS, TEAM STRUCTURE & GROWTH BLUEPRINT
frontmatter.description: Learn the systems, team structures, and strategies needed to successfully scale from one listing to a portfolio of properties.

frontmatter.title: MODULE 17 — Hiring, Training & Managing Remote Co-Hosts & Virtual Assistants
frontmatter.description: Build and manage a remote team of co-hosts and virtual assistants to support your growing STR business.

frontmatter.title: MODULE 18 — Emotional Intelligence, Boundaries & Avoiding Host Burnout
frontmatter.description: Develop emotional intelligence, set healthy boundaries, and implement strategies to prevent burnout in your hosting journey.

frontmatter.title: MODULE 19 — Crisis Management, Guest Misconduct & Safety Protocols
frontmatter.description: Prepare for and handle crises, guest misconduct, and safety issues with confidence and professionalism.

frontmatter.title: MODULE 20 — Building a Scalable, Future-Proof STR Business (Long-Term Strategy, Expansion & Legacy Systems)
frontmatter.description: Create a long-term vision and build systems that will sustain and grow your STR business for years to come.

courseData.title: STR Foundations Master Program
courseData.description: Master the fundamentals of short-term rental hosting with this comprehensive 21-module program. From market research to scaling multiple listings, learn everything you need to build a profitable and sustainable STR business.
